moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Stand Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Defense and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.effect: Applies the Physical Damage Reduction effect to the allied field of play.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Healing Sun 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is sunny.

passives.name: Endurance
passives.description: When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
